Just saying...the 99,999RP Icon is in the store for 2000IP...


I would expect Riot to actually give you a secret bonus for those who actually use 99,999RP
I got excited thinking it was 99,000 IP, finally something to spend my IP on :'(

You know my friend and I had a bet that i think Riot would like we're having a guess to see who will win the OPL (this was before the Semi-finals) if you lose you have to GIFT the 99,999 RP icon to the winner
Would be awesome to see an icon for milestones like total RP bought. 100,000RP 500,000RP and 1,000,000 RP icons would be great. because i would have to have bought at least 1,000,000 RP xD
Is the login music going to be available on Youtube or for download? I like it :)
It's on the link, if you click the 'login screen song' tab on the left ->
When will URF end?
Ban fucking Ryze again, still constant stun....

Dont get me wrong im happy URF is back. But you need to bring the permabans back or make significant changes to certain champs. You see the same champs banned and the same champs played. unbalanced and not fun for people who actually want to have fun and play something out of the ordinary like me. Sick of seeing the same champs all the time. Still happy this game mode is out tho but can get annoying. #URF2015
The whole point of URF is to have fun spamming m8.
all the death recaps say TONS of damage... im phreaked out {{item:3078}}
riot should really make some of these gamemodes perma. I missed this so much, maybe rito should make some of the gm perma. at least for custom games. {{item:3073}}

"How long will Ultra Random Figure mode last? 
The mode will last as long as Ultra Rapid Fire mode is active in League of Legends. Afterwards, Urf Figure will also say farewell to the store."

Rito, why not keep both the finishers and the icon?
The finishers don't seem to have a significant gameplay impact in the long run, and work to be a bit of cosmetic fun when you kill another player.
